extends Object

      • sendResult

        protected void sendResult(Message<JsonObject> pMessage,
              JsonObject pObject)
        Sends a result back to the client. The result will contain: {result: {object}}
        Parameters:
        pMessage - the message from the eventbus
        pObject - the result object for the client

      • sendError

        protected void sendError(Message<JsonObject> pMessage,
             Throwable pThrowable)
        Sends an error back to the client. The result will contain: {error: {message: 'text', stacktrace: 'text'}}
        Parameters:
        pMessage - the message from the eventbus
        pThrowable - the exception that should be send
